titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4-YY3-(Acetylamino)phenyl?amino?-1-amino-9,10-dihydro- 9,10-dioxo-2-anthracenesulfonic acid, monosodium salt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/7/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 4-YY3-(Acetylamino)phenyl?amino?-1-amino-9,10-dihydro- 9,10-dioxo-2-anthracenesulfonic acid, monosodium salt.
